title: Quarterly Text Analysis Extraction Schema
description: Schema for extracted structured data from quarterly text analysis

summary.description: Summary description of the company's business model

initiatives.description: List of strategic initiatives leading to growth

cumulative_progress.description: Paragraph describing overall progress since the initiative's inception, including key milestones achieved and progress relative to original goals

last_quarter_progress.description: Paragraph describing what was achieved or changed specifically in the current quarter

bullet_points.description: 2-4 bullet points highlighting progress on this initiative for the current quarter

items.description: A bullet point describing measurable progress on the initiative

changes.description: List of changes since last quarter

sentence.description: One sentence describing what has changed

headline_bullets.description: Up to 3 bullet points representing the most significant accomplishments, failures, or mixed/neutral results for the quarter, to be displayed on the quarter headline tile

text.description: The bullet point text describing the accomplishment, failure, or mixed/neutral result

indicator.description: Indicator showing whether this is an accomplishment (up), failure (down), or mixed/neutral (neutral - not strong enough in either direction)

quarterly_highlights.description: Quarterly highlights section containing 1-2 paragraphs and bullet points summarizing the quarter's key developments in accessible language

overall_quarter_strength.description: Overall assessment of the quarter's performance strength

enumDescriptions.up: Quarter shows strong positive performance, clear accomplishments, and material positive developments
enumDescriptions.down: Quarter shows negative performance, clear failures or setbacks, and material negative developments
enumDescriptions.neutral: Quarter shows mixed performance, ambiguous results, or not strong enough in either direction to be clearly positive or negative
